item.title: What's new in .NET 9: System.Text.Json improvements
item.description: .NET 9 is releasing in mid-November 2024. Like every .NET version, this introduces several important features and enhancements aligning developers with an ever-changing development ecosystem. In this blog series, I will explore critical updates in different areas of .NET.Â For this post, I will look through advancements in System.Text. Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/whats-new-in-net-9-system-text-json-improvements/
